document_data.name: ''Unlucky Thief's Gloves''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Unlucky thief's gloves''''' was a pair of [[enchanted]] gloves of dubious magics.
document_data.Powers: The gloves possessed a helpful enchantment that significantly boosted the wearer's manual dexterity and sleight of hand. However, if the gloves' wearer used this magic to steal something, a small piece of [[coal]] appeared in the thief's pocket, as if the magic was judging them.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, a pair of ''unlucky thief's gloves'' was displayed among splendorous enchanted rewards for those willing to partake in [[Akabi]]'s Wheel of Fortune game in the [[Circus of the Last Days]] during its stay in the [[Baldur's Gate/Rivington|Rivington]] neighborhood of [[Baldur's Gate]].
